    IIndividual GeneticAlgorithm.solveWithTournament()
    This method consists of sorting the population decreasingly by its fitness, then perform tournament selection, crossover, mutation and replacing individuals of the population.

    java.util.List<IIndividual> Population.getPopulation()  
    java.util.List<IIndividual> Population.TournamentSelection​(java.util.Random ran, int tournamentSize)
    Performs tournament selection on the population, and selects an individual from it, according to a generated random number and the fitness values of the population.
